title: 220: (BONUS) The Boys Take Over: Hot Bachelor Takes w/ Grayston & Evan
itunes:title: 220: (BONUS) The Boys Take Over: Hot Bachelor Takes w/ Grayston & Evan
description:
SURPRISE! Today The Broad’s studio has been taken over for a special bonus episode by the Chatty Bros(?!) aka their partners Grayston and Evan as the boys recap and offer their opinions on Matt James’ Bachelor season thus far! They discuss their initial thoughts and feelings on Matt James, their favorite limo entrances, vibrators on the first night, worshipping Queen Victoria, Chris Harrison’s secret rich guy “hobby”, hot takes on Sarah, and much more! 


FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: 

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/


FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
